mapper.select: SELECT menu_no , up_menu_no , menu_nm , menu_url , icon , menu_ty , level_no , sort_no , use_yn FROM MNG_MENU WHERE up_menu_no = #{upMenuNo} ORDER BY sort_no, menu_no

/* Query ID : mng.menu.selectMngMenuAuthListForSuperAdmin */ WITH RECURSIVE re_mng_menu AS ( ( SELECT menu_no, up_menu_no, menu_nm, menu_url, icon, menu_ty, 1 as level_no, sort_no, use_yn , CONCAT('/', menu_no) as menu_path , CONCAT('/', menu_nm) as menu_nm_path FROM MNG_MENU WHERE up_menu_no = 0 )
UNION ALL ( SELECT p.menu_no, p.up_menu_no, p.menu_nm, p.menu_url, p.icon, p.menu_ty, (1 + re_mng_menu.level_no) as level_no, p.sort_no, p.use_yn , CONCAT(re_mng_menu.menu_path, '/', p.menu_no) AS menu_path , CONCAT(re_mng_menu.menu_nm_path, '/', p.menu_nm) AS menu_nm_path FROM MNG_MENU AS p INNER JOIN re_mng_menu ON p.up_menu_no = re_mng_menu.menu_no ) ) SELECT menu_no , up_menu_no , menu_nm , menu_url , icon , menu_ty , level_no , sort_no , use_yn , 'Y' AS authrt_yn , 'Y' AS inq_yn , 'Y' AS wrt_yn , menu_path , menu_nm_path , (SELECT COUNT(menu_no) FROM MNG_MENU A WHERE A.up_menu_no = re_mng_menu.menu_no) AS child_cnt FROM re_mng_menu WHERE re_mng_menu.use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY up_menu_no, level_no, sort_no

/* Query ID : sysmng.menu.selectMngMenu */ SELECT menu_no , up_menu_no , ( SELECT menu_nm FROM MNG_MENU b WHERE A.up_menu_no = b.menu_no ) as up_menu_nm , menu_nm , menu_url , icon , menu_ty , level_no , sort_no , use_yn FROM MNG_MENU A WHERE menu_no = #{menuNo}

/* Query ID : sysmng.menu.selectMngMenuExceptList */ SELECT menu_no , up_menu_no , menu_nm , MENU_TY , MENU_DIV_yn FROM MNG_MENU WHERE menu_no NOT IN ( SELECT menu_no FROM MNG_MENU CONNECT BY PRIOR menu_no = up_menu_no START WITH menu_no = #{menuNo} ) ORDER BY sort_no, menu_no

/* Query ID : sysmng.menu.selectMenuNmFromUrl */ SELECT DIVS, UPPER_menu_nm, menu_nm, menu_url FROM ( (SELECT '1' AS DIVS ,(SELECT T.menu_nm FROM MNG_MENU T WHERE T.menu_no=TMM.up_menu_no) AS UPPER_menu_nm ,TMM.menu_nm ,TMM.menu_url FROM MNG_MENU TMM WHERE SUBSTR(TMM.menu_url,1, FN_LAST_INDEX(TMM.menu_url,'/')) = #{srchMenuUrl} ) UNION ALL (SELECT '2' AS DIVS ,(SELECT T.menu_nm FROM MNG_MENU T WHERE T.menu_no=TMM.up_menu_no) AS UPPER_menu_nm ,TMM.menu_nm ,TMM.menu_url FROM MNG_MENU TMM WHERE CONCAT(SUBSTR(TMM.menu_url,1, FN_LAST_INDEX(TMM.menu_url,'/')) LIKE #{srchMenuUrl}, '%') ) UNION ALL (SELECT '3' AS DIVS ,(SELECT T.menu_nm FROM MNG_MENU T WHERE T.menu_no=TMM.up_menu_no) AS up_menu_nm ,TMM.menu_nm ,TMM.menu_url FROM MNG_MENU TMM WHERE SUBSTR(TMM.menu_url,1, INSTR(TMM.menu_url, '/', (INSTR(TMM.menu_url, '/', (INSTR(TMM.menu_url, '/')+1))+1))) LIKE CONCAT(SUBSTR(#{srchMenuUrl},1, INSTR(#{srchMenuUrl}, '/', (INSTR(#{srchMenuUrl}, '/', (INSTR(#{srchMenuUrl}, '/')+1))+1))), '%') ORDER BY DIVS ASC, menu_url ASC ) ) V WHERE ROWNUM=1

/* Query ID : sysmng.menu.selectMenuInfoFromUrl */ SELECT (SELECT T.menu_nm FROM MNG_MENU T WHERE T.menu_no = TMM.up_menu_no) AS up_menu_nm , TMM.menu_nm , TMM.menu_url , TMM.menu_no FROM MNG_MENU TMM WHERE SUBSTR(TMM.menu_url, 1, FN_LAST_INDEX(TMM.menu_url, '/')) LIKE SUBSTR(#{srchMenuUrl},1,FN_LAST_INDEX(#{srchMenuUrl}, '/'))
